# React Native Project Instructions

## Project Type
- React Native CLI 0.83.0 (bare workflow, no Expo)
- Cross-platform mobile application (iOS & Android)
- TypeScript enabled

## Development Guidelines
- Use React Native CLI commands for building and running
- iOS development requires macOS with Xcode
- Android development requires Android Studio and SDK

## Common Commands
- `npx react-native start` - Start Metro bundler
- `npx react-native run-android` - Run on Android
- `npx react-native run-ios` - Run on iOS (macOS only)

## Project Structure
- `/android` - Android native code
- `/ios` - iOS native code  
- `App.tsx` - Main application component
- `/__tests__` - Test files

## Prerequisites
- Node.js 18+
- JDK 17 (for Android)
- Android Studio with Android SDK (for Android)
- Xcode (for iOS, macOS only)
